page.title: Learning Paths
page.description: Choose a technology to start your learning journey.

detail.title: {pathName} Learning Path
detail.comingSoon: Content for the {levelName} level is coming soon!
detail.noResources: No resources available for this section yet.

page.title: AI Code Playground
page.description: Sharpen your skills with unlimited, AI-generated coding exercises.

form.title: Exercise Generator
form.description: Select a technology and difficulty to generate a custom coding exercise.

result.title: Generated Exercise
result.description: Your AI-generated exercise will appear here.
result.placeholder: Your exercise will be shown here.

page.title: AI Refactor Challenges
page.description: Improve your code quality with AI-generated refactoring tasks.

form.title: Challenge Generator
form.description: Select a technology and difficulty to generate a code snippet to refactor.

challenge.title: Refactor Challenge
challenge.description: Refactor the code below to improve its quality, readability, and performance.

solution.title: Your Solution
solution.description: Write your refactored code in the editor below.

analysis.title: AI Analysis
analysis.description: Here is the AI's feedback on your refactored code.
analysis.placeholder: The analysis of your solution will appear here.

optimal.title: Optimal Solution
optimal.description: This is how the AI would refactor the code.

page.title: Skill Assessment Tests
page.description: Select a technology and test your knowledge to find your skill level.

container.prompt: Select a technology to start the assessment.

result.title: Test Complete!
result.description: You answered {score} out of {total} questions correctly.

quiz.description: Answer the following questions to the best of your ability.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: There was an error generating the content. Please try again.

quizGenerationFailed.title: Quiz Generation Failed
quizGenerationFailed.description: There was an error generating the quiz. Please try again.

csharp.description: Master C#, a versatile language for web, mobile, and game development.

module1.title: Introduction to C# and .NET
module1.description: Understand the basics of C#, its syntax, and the .NET framework.

module2.title: Variables and Data Types
module2.description: Learn about different data types, variables, and type conversion.

module1.title: C# Intermediate Learning Track
module1.description: Dive into dependency injection, data models in ASP.NET Core, and other advanced C# topics.

module1.title: Advanced C# Concepts
module1.description: Explore advanced topics like design patterns, performance optimization, and more.

angular.description: Build powerful single-page applications with Google's front-end framework.

module1.title: Getting Started with Angular
module1.description: Set up your first Angular project and understand its architecture.

module1.title: Intermediate Angular Concepts
module1.description: Deepen your knowledge of Angular with more advanced topics.

module1.title: Advanced Angular Techniques
module1.description: Master complex patterns and advanced features in Angular.

ionic.description: Develop cross-platform mobile apps with a single codebase using web technologies.

module1.title: Ionic Framework Fundamentals
module1.description: Learn the core concepts of Ionic for building mobile apps.

module1.title: Intermediate Ionic Concepts
module1.description: Explore intermediate topics like HTTP requests and data storage.

module1.title: Advanced Ionic Concepts
module1.description: Master advanced topics like authentication and native builds.

blazor.description: Create interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript.

module1.title: Introduction to Blazor
module1.description: Explore how Blazor lets you build client-side web apps with .NET.

module1.title: Intermediate Blazor Concepts
module1.description: Deepen your Blazor knowledge with topics like components and forms.

module1.title: Advanced Blazor Topics
module1.description: Master authentication, deployment, and other advanced Blazor features.

razor.description: Build dynamic web pages with this powerful template engine for ASP.NET.

module1.title: Razor Syntax Essentials
module1.description: Master the syntax for embedding server-based code into webpages.

module1.title: Intermediate Razor Concepts
module1.description: Learn about more advanced techniques in Razor like CRUD operations.

java.description: Learn the robust, object-oriented language that powers enterprise-level applications.

module1.title: Java Fundamentals
module1.description: Understand the basics of Java syntax, the JVM, and object-oriented principles.

azure.description: Deploy and manage applications and services through Microsoft's cloud computing platform.

module1.title: Introduction to Azure
module1.description: Learn about core Azure services like App Service, Azure SQL, and storage accounts.

module1.title: Azure Web App Solutions
module1.description: Dive deeper into developing and managing web applications on Azure.
